full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Supplier Information

* **Title**: Supply of Canine (K9) Kennel Inserts for Model Year 2021+ Suburban
* **Reference Number**: cb-5851-13146833
* **Solicitation Number**: M2989-2-0148
* **Publication Date**: 2023-05-24

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-06-23T17:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-06-30
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2026-03-31
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Worldwide
* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia, Canada

#### Tender Documents

* Please refer to the attached tender documents for further information.
* Bidders must submit a responsive bid that complies with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meets all mandatory technical evaluation criteria.
* Tenders may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Procurement Information

* **Method of Procurement**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Trade Agreements**: Various international agreements, including Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

#### Evaluation Criteria

* **Basis of Selection**: The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

#### Contact Information

* **Name**: Amy Wang
* **Email**: amy.wang@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (236) 330-3559
* **Address**: Mailstop 1004 -14200 Green Timbers Way, Surrey, BC Canada V3T 6P3

#### Additional Information

* The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
* Bidders are encouraged to create a profile in the Indigenous Business Directory to increase their visibility and may be eligible for additional business opportunities. To access more information, please visit www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory.

### Tender Documents

Please download the attached tender documents from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities) . 

Note: 

- Removed redundant information
- Rephrased the text to make it more professional and concise
- Included only relevant information and added sections to make
